tweet.text: Check out an insider’s view of policymaking and decisions regarding the Soviet Union in the 1980s. Deputy Secretary of State Kenneth Dam recorded daily notes on a tape recorder. See an example of his transcribed notes in #FRUS: https://t.co/qGsSEmVkqF https://t.co/i9zSZfnD3p
